e57::SphericalProjection

e57::SphericalProjection Class Reference

The e57::SphericalProjection is a structure that stores an image that is mapped from 3D using a spherical projection model. More...

#include <E57Simple.h>

double pixelHeight
 The height of a pixel in the image (in radians). Shall be positive.

Detailed Description

The e57::SphericalProjection is a structure that stores an image that is mapped from 3D using a spherical projection model.
